name: Ultimate Jumping Simulator
description:
Introducing an amazing game that will change the gaming industry as we all know it.

FEATURES:

  • You can jump, but jumping is hard. So why do it in real life when you can do it here instead!
  • Hand Drawn Art.
  • Made with the Godot Engine!
  • Made With Love.
  • btw the dudes name in the game is Jump Guy
